reviewText: I am planning a photo trip to Bryce and Zion and have been very disappointed with the poor quality of the Bryce and Zion videos.  This is, however, the best of the lot.
We're planning a trip to these parks with a limited time schedule. This DVD helps to pick out interesting sights. The DVD was very nice and adds to our anticipation for a wonderful trip.a
This is an excellent video to view before visiting the canyon or if you never had the chance to go there.

Last summer, my wife and I drove 5000 miles from California to Utah, Wyoming, and South Dakota and back. Our first stops were Zion and Bryce Canyons. There were breathtaking scenery that we feel so privileged to be able to contemplate their beauties. Should we have viewed this video before the trip, our enjoyment would certainly be greater, and fell really blessed being face-to-face with such creations. I highly recommend the video to anyone planning to see these canyons.TOURING BRYCE CANYON & ZION NATIONAL PARKS
Very nice video. We enjoyed watching this.
Not as much content as I'd hoped, but the content that is provided is quite lovely.
This is a beautiful and enjoyable DVD to watch.
Figured we wouldn't get there to see these 2 National Parks, so this was a great way to go and see without going.
Terrific overview of Bryce Canyon and Zion National Park.  It lets you know what you're in for if you travel to see these incredible sites for yourself!
